metadata.title: CVE-2016-10173 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in the minitar before 0.6 andarchive-tar-minitar 0.5.2 gems for Ruby allows remote attackers to write toarbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in a TAR archive entry.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10173` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-archive-tar-minitar - 0.5.4-3.1
ruby-minitar - 0.5.4-3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-minitar package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.5.4-3.1').
